name: Bullet Infernum
description:
Due to there being a game breaking bug right at the beginning of the game where the enemy instant transmits itself into space it is unplayable. :(. Lead to this being late for the BlackThornProd 2021 Game Jam.

Bullet Infernum is a a lofi bullet-hell/shooter/platformer. I haven't made any of those genres before so have fun.

How To Play:

Left click - Shoot in the direction of the mouse cursor.

Right click - Dash in the direction of the mouse cursor. If you dash through a bullet you collect ammo.

W - To Jump.

A/D - Move left and right.

Bugs:

Respawn jump height is double for some reason.

Can get stuck in walls so try not to.

Final Boss Fight camera is offset wrong. (It's top-centre).

You Win screen doesn't show when boss is deafeated in the final level. Just alt-tab and close through your OS to quit.
